{"id":441992149,"lang":"python3","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1610445304,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"64 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/441992149/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.next = next\nclass Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: ListNode, l2: ListNode) -> ListNode:\n        root = node = ListNode(0)\n        \n        carry = 0\n        while l1 or l2:\n            val = 0\n            if l1:\n                val += l1.val\n                l1 = l1.next\n            if l2:\n                val += l2.val\n                l2 = l2.next\n            val += carry\n            carry = val // 10\n            val = val % 10\n            node.next = ListNode(val)\n            node = node.next\n        if carry > 0:\n            node.next = ListNode(carry)\n        \n        return root.next","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
